dialogue: Industry trends just turned our way by total luck.
I need to implement some kind of change so it looks as if I caused the increase in profits that will happen anyway.
No, because we're already perfectly situated to take advantage of the trend.
That doesn't help me! I can't take credit for our future profits unless I do something I can say made a difference.
Maybe you could implement some sort of bogus company culture training program.
It's important to realize you're all idiots.
